summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway. A white van is seen on the left side of the lane, maintaining a consistent speed. The road ahead is clear with no immediate obstacles or pedestrians.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed, following the white van at a safe distance. The vehicle is staying in its lane and not making any sudden movements.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white van, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed and staying in its lane.

characters: Driver of the self-driving vehicle, driver of the white car
summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on a highway. A white car is seen approaching from the left lane and overtaking the self-driving vehicle. The white car then moves ahead and maintains a steady speed.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and lane position. The white car overtakes the self-driving vehicle from the left lane and moves ahead.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white car, approximately 5 meters away, overtaking the self-driving vehicle from the left lane. 2) Front: A truck, approximately 30 meters away, maintaining a steady speed.
